about_the_game:
Welcome to a captivating endless rogue-like first-person shooter game. In this fully hand drawn game, you will embark on a quest to collect powerful programs and navigate through human-infested labs in a bid for freedom. Uncover the intricacies of the story by exploring diverse maps and seeking aid from allies. You will take down enemies and collect upgrades to facilitate your escape from the humans. With a multitude of human enemies to face, you will have to figure out a way to utilize all of your skills and equipment to take them down. There are many levels and secrets to find while taking down the lab rats. There is no end to this challenge, so don't stop moving and see how far you can take it.

  • Master the art of shooting, dodging, and melee combat to overcome relentless foes.
  • Develop tactics to outsmart enemies and navigate through complex environments.
  • Efficiently utilize ammunition, health packs, and upgrades to maximize your pace.
  • Never stand still, or you'll never reach the end.

Welcome to a captivating endless rogue-like first-person shooter game. In this fully hand drawn game, you will embark on a quest to collect powerful programs and navigate through human-infested labs in a bid for freedom. Uncover the intricacies of the story by exploring diverse maps and seeking aid from allies. You will take down enemies and collect upgrades to facilitate your escape from the humans. With a multitude of human enemies to face, you will have to figure out a way to utilize all of your skills and equipment to take them down. There are many levels and secrets to find while taking down the lab rats. There is no end to this challenge, so don't stop moving and see how far you can take it.

  • Master the art of shooting, dodging, and melee combat to overcome relentless foes.
  • Develop tactics to outsmart enemies and navigate through complex environments.
  • Efficiently utilize ammunition, health packs, and upgrades to maximize your pace.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: HDMI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A rogue-like first-person shooter, battling through the human labs. You must escape with your life, and perhaps with others.
